name: R.O.B.t.
description:
A Game Made for Ludum Dare 48 "Deeper and Deeper"

You are R.O.B.t. You are a Robot. Due to a clerical error you have been sent to Robot Hell.

You must file a complaint with the Robot Hell labor department located on sub basement level 666.

Please collect all pages of the required JE-7 form and make your way to sub basement level 666. 

Descend "Deeper and Deeper" into robot hell, but don't fall too far or you will reach terminal velocity and smash your little 

robot innards.
